fields.emailNote: Email cannot be changed after registration

firstProgram.title: Let's Create Your First Program! 🎯
firstProgram.subtitle: Follow this practical tutorial to create your first program with automatic assignments

step1.title: 1. Register Students
step1.description: First, let's add students from the Theocratic Ministry School
tips: Add full name and position of each student
Mark family relationships for ministry parts
Configure qualifications according to S-38-T guidelines

step2.title: 2. Import a Program
step2.description: Now let's import the program from the Life and Ministry workbook
tips: Upload the official PDF from the workbook
Or paste content directly from JW.org
The system automatically identifies the 12 meeting parts

step3.title: 3. Generate Assignments
step3.description: Finally, the system will automatically create all assignments
tips: Click 'Generate Assignments' on the imported program
Review assignments on the preview page
Approve when satisfied with the result

firstProgram.featuresTitle: Why is the Ministerial System Special?

compliance.title: S-38-T Compliance
compliance.description: All assignments strictly follow organizational guidelines

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Intelligent algorithm distributes assignments in a balanced way

structure.title: Complete Structure
structure.description: Full support for the 12-part weekly meeting structure

firstProgram.tip: If you already have students registered, you can start directly by importing a program. The system works best with at least 8-10 students registered.
firstProgram.helpNote: You can access this tutorial again anytime from the Help menu

hero.title: Intelligent Automation of
hero.subtitle: Complete system for Jehovah's Witnesses congregations to organize Life and Ministry Meeting assignments with efficiency and compliance.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything your congregation needs to automate and optimize the ministerial assignment process with full compliance.

studentManagement.title: Complete Student Management
studentManagement.description: Detailed registration with validation of positions, family relationships, and congregational qualifications for accurate assignments.

programImport.title: Weekly Program Import
programImport.description: Automatic import from official PDFs of the Life and Ministry workbook with intelligent parsing.

notifications.title: Automatic Notifications
notifications.description: Send via email and WhatsApp with assignment details, scenes, and specific instructions for each student.

reports.title: Reports and Analytics
reports.description: Complete dashboard with participation history, engagement metrics, and reports for coordinators.

compliance.title: Rule Compliance
compliance.description: Intelligent algorithm that respects all guidelines of the Theocratic Ministry School and congregational regulations.

studentPortal.title: Student Portal
studentPortal.description: Responsive interface for students to view assignments, confirm participation, and contribute via donations.

benefits.title: Transform Your Congregation's Organization
benefits.subtitle: Drastically reduce time spent on administrative tasks and focus on what really matters: spiritual development.

timeEfficiency.title: Significant Time Savings
timeEfficiency.description: From hours to minutes: what used to take an entire afternoon of work is now resolved in less than 5 minutes per week.

compliance.title: Guaranteed Compliance
compliance.description: Intelligent algorithm that automatically respects all congregational rules, gender, position, and family relationships.

engagement.title: Student Engagement
engagement.description: Dedicated portal where students track their assignments, confirm participation, and contribute to sustainability.

sustainability.title: Sustainability via Donations
sustainability.description: Self-funded system through voluntary contributions, ensuring continuity without fixed costs for congregations.

cta.title: Get Started Today
cta.description: Register your congregation and experience the efficiency of ministerial automation. Complete setup in less than 30 minutes.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about the Ministerial System
faq.question: question
faq.supportTeam: Our support team is ready to help you

categoryDescriptions.students: How to manage students and qualifications

answers.whatIs: The Ministerial System is a complete platform to automate the management of Theocratic Ministry School assignments. It respects all S-38-T organizational guidelines and facilitates the work of superintendents.
answers.whoCanUse: The system is intended for Theocratic Ministry School superintendents and their assistants. Students have limited access to the student portal to view their assignments.
answers.cost: Yes! The system is completely free. We accept voluntary donations to maintain and improve the platform, but usage is free for all congregations.
answers.requirements: Just a modern browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and internet connection. Works on computers, tablets, and smartphones.

congregationsPage.title: Congregations
congregationsPage.subtitle: Over 100 congregations already experience the efficiency of ministerial automation. Join this growing community of organized servants.

central.name: Central Congregation
central.testimonial: The Ministerial System revolutionized our organization. We reduced assignment preparation time from 3 hours to 15 minutes!

north.name: North Congregation
north.testimonial: Excellent tool! Students now receive their assignments automatically and can confirm participation via mobile.

west.name: West Congregation
west.testimonial: Compliance with congregational rules is perfect. We never had problems with inappropriate assignments again.

south.name: South Congregation
south.testimonial: The student portal is fantastic. Young people are more engaged and organized with their ministerial participation.

timeReduction.title: Reduction in Preparation Time
timeReduction.description: Coordinators report that time spent organizing assignments has drastically reduced, allowing more focus on spiritual development.

engagement.title: Increase in Engagement
engagement.description: Students show greater participation and punctuality in assignments after implementing the notification system.

compliance.title: Rule Compliance
compliance.description: Zero inappropriate assignment errors since implementation, ensuring total compliance with congregational guidelines.

cta.title: Your Congregation Could Be Next!
